data.message: Dear God please tell me how to turn off the side swipe camera activation?   Deleting the app is an option....

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Stephen. You will be able to swipe away from these features when you don't want to create content or flip through Stories that friends have shared and continue browsing your News Feed like you've done before. However, people cannot remove these features from the Facebook app. -Jon
Hoping you will eventually see how a lot of people don't like it and remove them , at least make it optional , in fact all these extra add-ons should be optional
